name: 17th International Conference on Modern Research in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: Want to learn about the newest trends, advancements, and discoveries in the field of research and management? MEACONF 2024 is here to do that! Returning for the 17th edition, we’re thrilled to bring back this note worthy event. Over the last 11 years of this conference’s history, we have gathered a highly international audience pool. In fact, the versatility and diversity of our attendees coupled with their unique experiences is a big reason for the success of this management conference in previous years! Join us for our most extensive conference to date, taking place in Paris, France, from December 06 to 08, 2024\. Don’t miss out on our biggest International Conference on Modern Research in Management, Economics, and Accounting yet! The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of Paris free of charge. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The MEACONF will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, and connect. In-person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
